This card has narrow uses and is often overlooked..... exactly why I like it!   
  
If you want to draft a mill deck you'll usually be going blue/x. If your second color is white, I usually draft for more of a board clog/ stall strategy with [Cathedral Sanctifier](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cathedral Sanctifier)s and [Angelic Wall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Angelic Wall)s stopping any aggro decks from wiping you before you can get rolling. This is a great card that helps fill in your mana curve, since [Dreadwaters](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dreadwaters), [Stern Mentor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stern Mentor), and [Rotcrown Ghoul](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rotcrown Ghoul) are all 4+ cmc.... not to mention other great common cards in this deck type like [Amass the Components](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amass the Components) and [Elgaud Shieldmate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elgaud Shieldmate)  
  
Not only does it help your curve out, but it puts your angelic walls outside of [Thunderbolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thunderbolt) range. Really usefull since you sometimes have to pair your mentor up with a wall, and if it gets bolted that can really gum you up.
